00024 /*
00025  * state-vector management
00026  */
00027 
00028 Qureg createQureg(int numQubits, QuESTEnv env) {
00029     validateCreateNumQubits(numQubits, __func__);
00030     
00031     Qureg qureg;
00032     statevec_createQureg(&qureg, numQubits, env);
00033     qureg.isDensityMatrix = 0;
00034     qureg.numQubitsRepresented = numQubits;
00035     qureg.numQubitsInStateVec = numQubits;
00036     
00037     qasm_setup(&qureg);
00038     initZeroState(qureg);
00039     return qureg;
00040 }
00041 
00042 Qureg createDensityQureg(int numQubits, QuESTEnv env) {
00043     validateCreateNumQubits(numQubits, __func__);
00044     
00045     Qureg qureg;
00046     statevec_createQureg(&qureg, 2*numQubits, env);
00047     qureg.isDensityMatrix = 1;
00048     qureg.numQubitsRepresented = numQubits;
00049     qureg.numQubitsInStateVec = 2*numQubits;
00050     
00051     qasm_setup(&qureg);
00052     initZeroState(qureg);
00053     return qureg;
00054 }
00055 
00056 void destroyQureg(Qureg qureg, QuESTEnv env) {
00057     statevec_destroyQureg(qureg, env);
00058     qasm_free(qureg);
00059 }

00075     qasm_clearRecorded(qureg);

00079     qasm_printRecorded(qureg);
00080 }
00081 
00082 void writeRecordedQASMToFile(Qureg qureg, char* filename) {
00083     int success = qasm_writeRecordedToFile(qureg, filename);
00084     validateFileOpened(success, __func__);
00085 }

00088 /*
00089  * state initialisation
00090  */
00091 
00092 void initZeroState(Qureg qureg) {
00093     statevec_initZeroState(qureg); // valid for both statevec and density matrices
00094     
00095     qasm_recordInitZero(qureg);
00096 }
00097 
00098 void initPlusState(Qureg qureg) {
00099     if (qureg.isDensityMatrix)
00100         densmatr_initPlusState(qureg);
00101     else
00102         statevec_initPlusState(qureg);
00103     
00104     qasm_recordInitPlus(qureg);
00105 }
00106 
00107 void initClassicalState(Qureg qureg, long long int stateInd) {
00108     validateStateIndex(qureg, stateInd, __func__);
00109     
00110     if (qureg.isDensityMatrix)
00111         densmatr_initClassicalState(qureg, stateInd);
00112     else
00113         statevec_initClassicalState(qureg, stateInd);
00114     
00115     qasm_recordInitClassical(qureg, stateInd);
00116     
00117 }
00118 
00119 void initPureState(Qureg qureg, Qureg pure) {
00120     validateSecondQuregStateVec(pure, __func__);
00121     validateMatchingQuregDims(qureg, pure, __func__);
00122 
00123     if (qureg.isDensityMatrix)
00124         densmatr_initPureState(qureg, pure);
00125     else
00126         statevec_cloneQureg(qureg, pure);
00127     
00128     qasm_recordComment(qureg, "Here, the register was initialised to an undisclosed given pure state.");
00129 }
00130 
00131 void initStateFromAmps(Qureg qureg, qreal* reals, qreal* imags) {
00132     validateStateVecQureg(qureg, __func__);
00133     
00134     statevec_setAmps(qureg, 0, reals, imags, qureg.numAmpsTotal);
00135     
00136     qasm_recordComment(qureg, "Here, the register was initialised to an undisclosed given pure state.");
00137 }
00138 
00139 void setAmps(Qureg qureg, long long int startInd, qreal* reals, qreal* imags, long long int numAmps) {
00140     validateStateVecQureg(qureg, __func__);
00141     validateNumAmps(qureg, startInd, numAmps, __func__);
00142     
00143     statevec_setAmps(qureg, startInd, reals, imags, numAmps);
00144     
00145     qasm_recordComment(qureg, "Here, some amplitudes in the statevector were manually edited.");
00146 }
00147 
00148 void cloneQureg(Qureg targetQureg, Qureg copyQureg) {
00149     validateMatchingQuregTypes(targetQureg, copyQureg, __func__);
00150     validateMatchingQuregDims(targetQureg, copyQureg, __func__);
00151     
00152     statevec_cloneQureg(targetQureg, copyQureg);
00153 }

00157  * unitary gates

00159 
00160 void hadamard(Qureg qureg, const int targetQubit) {
00161     validateTarget(qureg, targetQubit, __func__);
00162     
00163     statevec_hadamard(qureg, targetQubit);
00164     if (qureg.isDensityMatrix) {
00165         statevec_hadamard(qureg, targetQubit+qureg.numQubitsRepresented);
00166     }
00167     
00168     qasm_recordGate(qureg, GATE_HADAMARD, targetQubit);
00169 }
00170 
00171 void rotateX(Qureg qureg, const int targetQubit, qreal angle) {
00172     validateTarget(qureg, targetQubit, __func__);
00173     
00174     statevec_rotateX(qureg, targetQubit, angle);
00175     if (qureg.isDensityMatrix) {
00176         statevec_rotateX(qureg, targetQubit+qureg.numQubitsRepresented, -angle);
00177     }
00178     
00179     qasm_recordParamGate(qureg, GATE_ROTATE_X, targetQubit, angle);
00180 }
00181 
00182 void rotateY(Qureg qureg, const int targetQubit, qreal angle) {
00183     validateTarget(qureg, targetQubit, __func__);
00184     
00185     statevec_rotateY(qureg, targetQubit, angle);
00186     if (qureg.isDensityMatrix) {
00187         statevec_rotateY(qureg, targetQubit+qureg.numQubitsRepresented, angle);
00188     }
00189     
00190     qasm_recordParamGate(qureg, GATE_ROTATE_Y, targetQubit, angle);
00191 }
00192 
00193 void rotateZ(Qureg qureg, const int targetQubit, qreal angle) {
00194     validateTarget(qureg, targetQubit, __func__);
00195     
00196     statevec_rotateZ(qureg, targetQubit, angle);
00197     if (qureg.isDensityMatrix) {
00198         statevec_rotateZ(qureg, targetQubit+qureg.numQubitsRepresented, -angle);
00199     }
00200     
00201     qasm_recordParamGate(qureg, GATE_ROTATE_Z, targetQubit, angle);

00203 
00204 void controlledRotateX(Qureg qureg, const int controlQubit, const int targetQubit, qreal angle) {
00205     validateControlTarget(qureg, controlQubit, targetQubit, __func__);
00206     
00207     statevec_controlledRotateX(qureg, controlQubit, targetQubit, angle);
00208     if (qureg.isDensityMatrix) {
00209         int shift = qureg.numQubitsRepresented;
00210         statevec_controlledRotateX(qureg, controlQubit+shift, targetQubit+shift, -angle);
00211     }
00212     
00213     qasm_recordControlledParamGate(qureg, GATE_ROTATE_X, controlQubit, targetQubit, angle);
00214 }
00215 
00216 void controlledRotateY(Qureg qureg, const int controlQubit, const int targetQubit, qreal angle) {
00217     validateControlTarget(qureg, controlQubit, targetQubit, __func__);
00218     
00219     statevec_controlledRotateY(qureg, controlQubit, targetQubit, angle);
00220     if (qureg.isDensityMatrix) {
00221         int shift = qureg.numQubitsRepresented;
00222         statevec_controlledRotateY(qureg, controlQubit+shift, targetQubit+shift, angle); // rotateY is real
00223     }
00224 
00225     qasm_recordControlledParamGate(qureg, GATE_ROTATE_Y, controlQubit, targetQubit, angle);
00226 }
00227 
00228 void controlledRotateZ(Qureg qureg, const int controlQubit, const int targetQubit, qreal angle) {
00229     validateControlTarget(qureg, controlQubit, targetQubit, __func__);
00230     
00231     statevec_controlledRotateZ(qureg, controlQubit, targetQubit, angle);
00232     if (qureg.isDensityMatrix) {
00233         int shift = qureg.numQubitsRepresented;
00234         statevec_controlledRotateZ(qureg, controlQubit+shift, targetQubit+shift, -angle);
00235     }
00236     
00237     qasm_recordControlledParamGate(qureg, GATE_ROTATE_Z, controlQubit, targetQubit, angle);
00238 }
00239 
00240 void unitary(Qureg qureg, const int targetQubit, ComplexMatrix2 u) {
00241     validateTarget(qureg, targetQubit, __func__);
00242     validateUnitaryMatrix(u, __func__);
00243     
00244     statevec_unitary(qureg, targetQubit, u);
00245     if (qureg.isDensityMatrix) {
00246         statevec_unitary(qureg, targetQubit+qureg.numQubitsRepresented, getConjugateMatrix(u));
00247     }
00248     
00249     qasm_recordUnitary(qureg, u, targetQubit);
00250 }
00251 
00252 void controlledUnitary(Qureg qureg, const int controlQubit, const int targetQubit, ComplexMatrix2 u) {
00253     validateControlTarget(qureg, controlQubit, targetQubit, __func__);
00254     validateUnitaryMatrix(u, __func__);
00255     
00256     statevec_controlledUnitary(qureg, controlQubit, targetQubit, u);
00257     if (qureg.isDensityMatrix) {
00258         int shift = qureg.numQubitsRepresented;
00259         statevec_controlledUnitary(qureg, controlQubit+shift, targetQubit+shift, getConjugateMatrix(u));
00260     }
00261     
00262     qasm_recordControlledUnitary(qureg, u, controlQubit, targetQubit);
00263 }
00264 
00265 void multiControlledUnitary(Qureg qureg, int* controlQubits, const int numControlQubits, const int targetQubit, ComplexMatrix2 u) {
00266     validateMultiControlsTarget(qureg, controlQubits, numControlQubits, targetQubit, __func__);
00267     validateUnitaryMatrix(u, __func__);
00268     
00269     statevec_multiControlledUnitary(qureg, controlQubits, numControlQubits, targetQubit, u);
00270     if (qureg.isDensityMatrix) {
00271         int shift = qureg.numQubitsRepresented;
00272         shiftIndices(controlQubits, numControlQubits, shift);
00273         statevec_multiControlledUnitary(qureg, controlQubits, numControlQubits, targetQubit+shift, getConjugateMatrix(u));
00274         shiftIndices(controlQubits, numControlQubits, -shift);
00275     }
00276     
00277     qasm_recordMultiControlledUnitary(qureg, u, controlQubits, numControlQubits, targetQubit);
00278 }
00279 
00280 void compactUnitary(Qureg qureg, const int targetQubit, Complex alpha, Complex beta) {
00281     validateTarget(qureg, targetQubit, __func__);
00282     validateUnitaryComplexPair(alpha, beta, __func__);
00283     
00284     statevec_compactUnitary(qureg, targetQubit, alpha, beta);
00285     if (qureg.isDensityMatrix) {
00286         int shift = qureg.numQubitsRepresented;
00287         statevec_compactUnitary(qureg, targetQubit+shift, getConjugateScalar(alpha), getConjugateScalar(beta));
00288     }
00289 
00290     qasm_recordCompactUnitary(qureg, alpha, beta, targetQubit);
00291 }
00292 
00293 void controlledCompactUnitary(Qureg qureg, const int controlQubit, const int targetQubit, Complex alpha, Complex beta) {
00294     validateControlTarget(qureg, controlQubit, targetQubit, __func__);
00295     validateUnitaryComplexPair(alpha, beta, __func__);
00296     
00297     statevec_controlledCompactUnitary(qureg, controlQubit, targetQubit, alpha, beta);
00298     if (qureg.isDensityMatrix) {
00299         int shift = qureg.numQubitsRepresented;
00300         statevec_controlledCompactUnitary(qureg, 
00301             controlQubit+shift, targetQubit+shift, 
00302             getConjugateScalar(alpha), getConjugateScalar(beta));
00303     }
00304     
00305     qasm_recordControlledCompactUnitary(qureg, alpha, beta, controlQubit, targetQubit);
00306 }

00308 void pauliX(Qureg qureg, const int targetQubit) {
00309     validateTarget(qureg, targetQubit, __func__);
00310     
00311     statevec_pauliX(qureg, targetQubit);
00312     if (qureg.isDensityMatrix) {
00313         statevec_pauliX(qureg, targetQubit+qureg.numQubitsRepresented);
00314     }
00315     
00316     qasm_recordGate(qureg, GATE_SIGMA_X, targetQubit);
00317 }
00318 
00319 void pauliY(Qureg qureg, const int targetQubit) {
00320     validateTarget(qureg, targetQubit, __func__);
00321     
00322     statevec_pauliY(qureg, targetQubit);
00323     if (qureg.isDensityMatrix) {
00324         statevec_pauliYConj(qureg, targetQubit + qureg.numQubitsRepresented);
00325     }
00326     
00327     qasm_recordGate(qureg, GATE_SIGMA_Y, targetQubit);
00328 }
00329

00363 void phaseShift(Qureg qureg, const int targetQubit, qreal angle) {
00364     validateTarget(qureg, targetQubit, __func__);
00365     
00366     statevec_phaseShift(qureg, targetQubit, angle);
00367     if (qureg.isDensityMatrix) {
00368         statevec_phaseShift(qureg, targetQubit+qureg.numQubitsRepresented, -angle);
00369     }
00370     
00371     qasm_recordParamGate(qureg, GATE_PHASE_SHIFT, targetQubit, angle);
00372 }
00373 
00374 void controlledPhaseShift(Qureg qureg, const int idQubit1, const int idQubit2, qreal angle) {
00375     validateControlTarget(qureg, idQubit1, idQubit2, __func__);
00376     
00377     statevec_controlledPhaseShift(qureg, idQubit1, idQubit2, angle);
00378     if (qureg.isDensityMatrix) {
00379         int shift = qureg.numQubitsRepresented;
00380         statevec_controlledPhaseShift(qureg, idQubit1+shift, idQubit2+shift, -angle);
00381     }
00382     
00383     qasm_recordControlledParamGate(qureg, GATE_PHASE_SHIFT, idQubit1, idQubit2, angle);
00384 }
00385 
00386 void multiControlledPhaseShift(Qureg qureg, int *controlQubits, int numControlQubits, qreal angle) {
00387     validateMultiControls(qureg, controlQubits, numControlQubits, __func__);
00388     
00389     statevec_multiControlledPhaseShift(qureg, controlQubits, numControlQubits, angle);
00390     if (qureg.isDensityMatrix) {
00391         int shift = qureg.numQubitsRepresented;
00392         shiftIndices(controlQubits, numControlQubits, shift);
00393         statevec_multiControlledPhaseShift(qureg, controlQubits, numControlQubits, angle);
00394         shiftIndices(controlQubits, numControlQubits, -shift);
00395     }
00396     
00397     qasm_recordMultiControlledParamGate(qureg, GATE_PHASE_SHIFT, controlQubits, numControlQubits-1, controlQubits[numControlQubits-1], angle);
00398 }
00399 
00400 void controlledNot(Qureg qureg, const int controlQubit, const int targetQubit) {
00401     validateControlTarget(qureg, controlQubit, targetQubit, __func__);
00402     
00403     statevec_controlledNot(qureg, controlQubit, targetQubit);
00404     if (qureg.isDensityMatrix) {
00405         int shift = qureg.numQubitsRepresented;
00406         statevec_controlledNot(qureg, controlQubit+shift, targetQubit+shift);
00407     }
00408     
00409     qasm_recordControlledGate(qureg, GATE_SIGMA_X, controlQubit, targetQubit);
00410 }

00412 void controlledPauliY(Qureg qureg, const int controlQubit, const int targetQubit) {

00414     
00415     statevec_controlledPauliY(qureg, controlQubit, targetQubit);
00416     if (qureg.isDensityMatrix) {
00417         int shift = qureg.numQubitsRepresented;
00418         statevec_controlledPauliYConj(qureg, controlQubit+shift, targetQubit+shift);
00419     }

00424 void controlledPhaseFlip(Qureg qureg, const int idQubit1, const int idQubit2) {
00425     validateControlTarget(qureg, idQubit1, idQubit2, __func__);
00426     
00427     statevec_controlledPhaseFlip(qureg, idQubit1, idQubit2);
00428     if (qureg.isDensityMatrix) {
00429         int shift = qureg.numQubitsRepresented;
00430         statevec_controlledPhaseFlip(qureg, idQubit1+shift, idQubit2+shift);
00431     }
00432     
00433     qasm_recordControlledGate(qureg, GATE_SIGMA_Z, idQubit1, idQubit2);
00434 }
00435 
00436 void multiControlledPhaseFlip(Qureg qureg, int *controlQubits, int numControlQubits) {
00437     validateMultiControls(qureg, controlQubits, numControlQubits, __func__);
00438     
00439     statevec_multiControlledPhaseFlip(qureg, controlQubits, numControlQubits);
00440     if (qureg.isDensityMatrix) {
00441         int shift = qureg.numQubitsRepresented;
00442         shiftIndices(controlQubits, numControlQubits, shift);
00443         statevec_multiControlledPhaseFlip(qureg, controlQubits, numControlQubits);
00444         shiftIndices(controlQubits, numControlQubits, -shift);
00445     }
00446     
00447     qasm_recordMultiControlledGate(qureg, GATE_SIGMA_Z, controlQubits, numControlQubits-1, controlQubits[numControlQubits-1]);
00448 }
00449 
00450 void rotateAroundAxis(Qureg qureg, const int rotQubit, qreal angle, Vector axis) {
00451     validateTarget(qureg, rotQubit, __func__);
00452     validateVector(axis, __func__);
00453     
00454     statevec_rotateAroundAxis(qureg, rotQubit, angle, axis);
00455     if (qureg.isDensityMatrix) {
00456         int shift = qureg.numQubitsRepresented;
00457         statevec_rotateAroundAxisConj(qureg, rotQubit+shift, angle, axis);
00458     }
00459     
00460     qasm_recordAxisRotation(qureg, angle, axis, rotQubit);
00461 }
00462 
00463 void controlledRotateAroundAxis(Qureg qureg, const int controlQubit, const int targetQubit, qreal angle, Vector axis) {
00464     validateControlTarget(qureg, controlQubit, targetQubit, __func__);
00465     validateVector(axis, __func__);
00466     
00467     statevec_controlledRotateAroundAxis(qureg, controlQubit, targetQubit, angle, axis);
00468     if (qureg.isDensityMatrix) {
00469         int shift = qureg.numQubitsRepresented;
00470         statevec_controlledRotateAroundAxisConj(qureg, controlQubit+shift, targetQubit+shift, angle, axis);
00471     }
00472     
00473     qasm_recordControlledAxisRotation(qureg, angle, axis, controlQubit, targetQubit);
00474 }

00477 /*
00478  * register attributes
00479  */
00480 
00481 int getNumQubits(Qureg qureg) {
00482     return qureg.numQubitsRepresented;
00483 }
00484 
00485 int getNumAmps(Qureg qureg) {
00486     validateStateVecQureg(qureg, __func__);
00487     
00488     return qureg.numAmpsTotal;
00489 }
00490 
00491 qreal getRealAmp(Qureg qureg, long long int index) {
00492     validateStateVecQureg(qureg, __func__);
00493     validateStateIndex(qureg, index, __func__);
00494     
00495     return statevec_getRealAmp(qureg, index);
00496 }
00497 
00498 qreal getImagAmp(Qureg qureg, long long int index) {
00499     validateStateVecQureg(qureg, __func__);
00500     validateStateIndex(qureg, index, __func__);
00501     
00502     return statevec_getImagAmp(qureg, index);
00503 }
00504 
00505 qreal getProbAmp(Qureg qureg, long long int index) {
00506     validateStateVecQureg(qureg, __func__);
00507     validateStateIndex(qureg, index, __func__);
00508     
00509     return statevec_getProbAmp(qureg, index);
00510 }
00511 
00512 Complex getAmp(Qureg qureg, long long int index) {
00513     validateStateVecQureg(qureg, __func__);
00514     validateStateIndex(qureg, index, __func__);
00515     
00516     Complex amp;
00517     amp.real = statevec_getRealAmp(qureg, index);
00518     amp.imag = statevec_getImagAmp(qureg, index);
00519     return amp;
00520 }
00521 
00522 Complex getDensityAmp(Qureg qureg, long long int row, long long int col) {
00523     validateDensityMatrQureg(qureg, __func__);
00524     validateStateIndex(qureg, row, __func__);
00525     validateStateIndex(qureg, col, __func__);
00526     
00527     long long ind = row + col*(1LL << qureg.numQubitsRepresented);
00528     Complex amp;
00529     amp.real = statevec_getRealAmp(qureg, ind);
00530     amp.imag = statevec_getImagAmp(qureg, ind);
00531     return amp;
00532 }
00533 
00534 
00535 /*
00536  * non-unitary actions
00537  */
00538 
00539 qreal collapseToOutcome(Qureg qureg, const int measureQubit, int outcome) {
00540     validateTarget(qureg, measureQubit, __func__);
00541     validateOutcome(outcome, __func__);
00542     
00543     qreal outcomeProb;
00544     if (qureg.isDensityMatrix) {
00545         outcomeProb = densmatr_calcProbOfOutcome(qureg, measureQubit, outcome);
00546         validateMeasurementProb(outcomeProb, __func__);
00547         densmatr_collapseToKnownProbOutcome(qureg, measureQubit, outcome, outcomeProb);
00548     } else {
00549         outcomeProb = statevec_calcProbOfOutcome(qureg, measureQubit, outcome);
00550         validateMeasurementProb(outcomeProb, __func__);
00551         statevec_collapseToKnownProbOutcome(qureg, measureQubit, outcome, outcomeProb);
00552     }
00553     
00554     qasm_recordMeasurement(qureg, measureQubit);
00555     return outcomeProb;
00556 }
00557 
00558 int measureWithStats(Qureg qureg, int measureQubit, qreal *outcomeProb) {
00559     validateTarget(qureg, measureQubit, __func__);
00560 
00561     int outcome;
00562     if (qureg.isDensityMatrix)
00563         outcome = densmatr_measureWithStats(qureg, measureQubit, outcomeProb);
00564     else
00565         outcome = statevec_measureWithStats(qureg, measureQubit, outcomeProb);
00566     
00567     qasm_recordMeasurement(qureg, measureQubit);
00568     return outcome;
00569 }
00570 
00571 int measure(Qureg qureg, int measureQubit) {
00572     validateTarget(qureg, measureQubit, __func__);
00573     
00574     int outcome;
00575     qreal discardedProb;
00576     if (qureg.isDensityMatrix)
00577         outcome = densmatr_measureWithStats(qureg, measureQubit, &discardedProb);
00578     else
00579         outcome = statevec_measureWithStats(qureg, measureQubit, &discardedProb);
00580     
00581     qasm_recordMeasurement(qureg, measureQubit);
00582     return outcome;
00583 }
00584 
00585 void addDensityMatrix(Qureg combineQureg, qreal otherProb, Qureg otherQureg) {
00586     validateDensityMatrQureg(combineQureg, __func__);
00587     validateDensityMatrQureg(otherQureg, __func__);
00588     validateMatchingQuregDims(combineQureg, otherQureg, __func__);
00589     validateProb(otherProb, __func__);
00590     
00591     densmatr_addDensityMatrix(combineQureg, otherProb, otherQureg);
00592 }

00595 /*
00596  * calculations
00597  */
00598 
00599 qreal calcTotalProb(Qureg qureg) {
00600     if (qureg.isDensityMatrix)  
00601             return densmatr_calcTotalProb(qureg);
00602         else
00603             return statevec_calcTotalProb(qureg);
00604 }
00605 
00606 Complex calcInnerProduct(Qureg bra, Qureg ket) {
00607     validateStateVecQureg(bra, __func__);
00608     validateStateVecQureg(ket, __func__);
00609     validateMatchingQuregDims(bra, ket,  __func__);
00610     
00611     return statevec_calcInnerProduct(bra, ket);
00612 }
00613 
00614 qreal calcProbOfOutcome(Qureg qureg, const int measureQubit, int outcome) {
00615     validateTarget(qureg, measureQubit, __func__);
00616     validateOutcome(outcome, __func__);
00617     
00618     if (qureg.isDensityMatrix)
00619         return densmatr_calcProbOfOutcome(qureg, measureQubit, outcome);
00620     else
00621         return statevec_calcProbOfOutcome(qureg, measureQubit, outcome);
00622 }
00623 
00624 qreal calcPurity(Qureg qureg) {
00625     validateDensityMatrQureg(qureg, __func__);
00626     
00627     return densmatr_calcPurity(qureg);
00628 }
00629 
00630 qreal calcFidelity(Qureg qureg, Qureg pureState) {
00631     validateSecondQuregStateVec(pureState, __func__);
00632     validateMatchingQuregDims(qureg, pureState, __func__);
00633     
00634     if (qureg.isDensityMatrix)
00635         return densmatr_calcFidelity(qureg, pureState);
00636     else
00637         return statevec_calcFidelity(qureg, pureState);
00638 }

00644 
00645 void applyOneQubitDephaseError(Qureg qureg, const int targetQubit, qreal prob) {
00646     validateDensityMatrQureg(qureg, __func__);
00647     validateTarget(qureg, targetQubit, __func__);
00648     validateOneQubitDephaseProb(prob, __func__);
00649     
00650     densmatr_oneQubitDephase(qureg, targetQubit, 2*prob);
00651 }
00652 
00653 void applyTwoQubitDephaseError(Qureg qureg, int qubit1, int qubit2, qreal prob) {
00654     validateDensityMatrQureg(qureg, __func__);
00655     validateUniqueTargets(qureg, qubit1, qubit2, __func__);
00656     validateTwoQubitDephaseProb(prob, __func__);
00657 
00658     ensureIndsIncrease(&qubit1, &qubit2);
00659     densmatr_twoQubitDephase(qureg, qubit1, qubit2, (4*prob)/3.0);
00660 }
00661 
00662 void applyOneQubitDepolariseError(Qureg qureg, const int targetQubit, qreal prob) {
00663     validateDensityMatrQureg(qureg, __func__);
00664     validateTarget(qureg, targetQubit, __func__);
00665     validateOneQubitDepolProb(prob, __func__);
00666     
00667     densmatr_oneQubitDepolarise(qureg, targetQubit, (4*prob)/3.0);
00668 }
00669 
00670 void applyTwoQubitDepolariseError(Qureg qureg, int qubit1, int qubit2, qreal prob) {
00671     validateDensityMatrQureg(qureg, __func__);
00672     validateUniqueTargets(qureg, qubit1, qubit2, __func__);
00673     validateTwoQubitDepolProb(prob, __func__);
00674     
00675     ensureIndsIncrease(&qubit1, &qubit2);
00676     densmatr_twoQubitDepolarise(qureg, qubit1, qubit2, (16*prob)/15.0);
00677 }
